headline: Piper Sandler Raises PT on Valero Energy Corporation (VLO); Maintains ‘Overweight’ Rating
summary: Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) is included in our list of the 13 Best Oil Refinery Stocks to Buy Right Now. On July 28, 2025, Piper Sandler increased its price target on Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE:VLO) from $159 to $168, maintaining an ‘Overweight’ rating. The analyst cited the company’s resilience demonstrated in Q2. However, Piper Sandler […]
